title: Network sharing and portable hotspots
answer:
The Wi-Fi hotspots of the phone means that the auxiliary machine accesses the Internet by connecting to the test machine after the hotspots are enabled on the test machine. 

 Method to enable: Settings > More... > Mobile network and Portable Wi-Fi hotspots. 

 After being turned on, the auxiliary phone will search for the test phone with Wi-Fi and connect to the Internet. 

 Also, configure the hot-spot name and encryption mode and other features in Set up Wi-Fi hotspot.
